languages.text: {n}Инфернус-мастер весело салютует папиросой.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, вот так встреча! Что привело вас в этот отсек, знаменитая кухня и роскошные виды?"

{n}The Infernus Master salutes you cheerfully with his lho-stick.{/n} "Lord Captain, what an unexpected encounter! What brings you to this compartment? The famous cuisine and magnificent vistas, no doubt?"
languages.original_text: {n}Инфернус-мастер весело салютует папиросой.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, вот так встреча! Что привело вас в этот отсек, знаменитая кухня и роскошные виды?"

{n}The Infernus Master salutes you cheerfully with his lho-stick.{/n} "Lord Captain, what an unexpected encounter! What brings you to this compartment? The famous cuisine and magnificent vistas, no doubt?"

languages.text: {n}El maestro de infernus te saluda alegremente, cigarrillo de lho en mano.{/n} «¡Lord Capitán, qué encuentro tan inesperado! ¿Qué l{mf|e|a} trae a este compartimento? ¿Su famosa cocina y sus magníficas vistas, asumo?».
languages.original_text: {n}The Infernus Master salutes you cheerfully with his lho-stick.{/n} "Lord Captain, what an unexpected encounter! What brings you to this compartment? The famous cuisine and magnificent vistas, no doubt?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El maestro de infernus te saluda alegremente, cigarrillo de lho en mano.{/n} «¡Lord Capitán, qué encuentro tan inesperado! ¿Qué l{mf|e|a} trae a este compartimento? ¿Su famosa cocina y sus magníficas vistas, asumo?».

languages.text: {n}インフェルヌスマスターはルホスティックで、あなたに元気よく敬礼した。{/n} 「ロード・キャプテン、思いがけない出会いですね！なぜこの区画にいるんですか？有名な料理と壮大な景色を楽しみにといったところでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: {n}The Infernus Master salutes you cheerfully with his lho-stick.{/n} "Lord Captain, what an unexpected encounter! What brings you to this compartment? The famous cuisine and magnificent vistas, no doubt?"

traits.locale_text: {n}インフェルヌスマスターはアイホスティックで、あなたに元気よく敬礼した。{/n} 「ロード・キャプテン、思いがけない出会いですね！なぜこの区画にいるんですか？有名な料理と壮大な景色を楽しみにといったところでしょうか？」

languages.text: {n}控火大师手里夹着麻烟，愉快地向你致敬。{/n}“舰长大人，没想到会在这里遇到您！您怎么会跑到这种地方？肯定是为了享受著名的美食和壮观的美景吧？”
languages.original_text: {n}The Infernus Master salutes you cheerfully with his lho-stick.{/n} "Lord Captain, what an unexpected encounter! What brings you to this compartment? The famous cuisine and magnificent vistas, no doubt?"

traits.locale_text: {n}控火大师手里夹着麻烟，愉快地向你致敬。{/n}“舰长大人，没想到会在这里遇到您！您怎么会跑到这种地方？肯定是为了享受著名的美食和壮观的美景吧？”

languages.text: {n}Der Infernus-Meister salutiert freudig mit seinem Lho-Stock vor dir.{/n} "Lord Captain, was für ein unerwartetes Zusammentreffen! Was führt Euch in diese Abteilung? Die berühmte Küche und die großartigen Panoramen, möchte ich wetten?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Infernus Master salutes you cheerfully with his lho-stick.{/n} "Lord Captain, what an unexpected encounter! What brings you to this compartment? The famous cuisine and magnificent vistas, no doubt?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Infernus-Meister salutiert freudig mit seinem Lho-Stock vor dir.{/n} "Lord Captain, was für ein unerwartetes Zusammentreffen! Was führt Euch in diese Abteilung? Die berühmte Küche und die großartigen Panoramen, möchte ich wetten?"

languages.text: {n}Le maître-infernus vous salue gaiement, son éternel cigalho à la bouche.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! En voilà, une visite inattendue ! Quel bon vent vous amène dans ce modeste compartiment ? Sa cuisine raffinée et ses panoramas à couper le souffle, je présume ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The Infernus Master salutes you cheerfully with his lho-stick.{/n} "Lord Captain, what an unexpected encounter! What brings you to this compartment? The famous cuisine and magnificent vistas, no doubt?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le maître-infernus vous salue gaiement, son éternel cigalho à la bouche.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! En voilà, une visite inattendue ! Quel bon vent vous amène dans ce modeste compartiment ? Sa cuisine raffinée et ses panoramas à couper le souffle, je présume ? »

languages.text: {n}İtfa Üstadı, liho dalıyla birlikte seni neşeyle selamlıyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, nasıl da beklenmedik bir tesadüf böyle! Bu kompartımana sizi getiren nedir? Ünlü mutfağı ve muazzam manzaraları olduğuna kuşku yok herhâlde, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Infernus Master salutes you cheerfully with his lho-stick.{/n} "Lord Captain, what an unexpected encounter! What brings you to this compartment? The famous cuisine and magnificent vistas, no doubt?"
